channel.title: CVE Feed for Dover Fueling Solutions (DFS) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dover Fueling Solutions (DFS) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43693|2024-09-25T16:55:33.557Z -- dover%20fueling%20solutions%20%28dfs%29 -- progauge%20maglink%20lx%20console
item.description: A specially crafted POST request to the ProGauge MAGLINK LX CONSOLE UTILITY sub-menu can allow a remote attacker to inject arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-45373|2024-09-25T16:57:09.490Z -- dover%20fueling%20solutions%20%28dfs%29 -- progauge%20maglink%20lx%20console
item.description: Once logged in to ProGauge MAGLINK LX4 CONSOLE, a valid user can change their privileges to administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-45066|2024-09-25T16:54:10.381Z -- dover%20fueling%20solutions%20%28dfs%29 -- progauge%20maglink%20lx%20console
item.description: A specially crafted POST request to the ProGauge MAGLINK LX CONSOLE IP sub-menu can allow a remote attacker to inject arbitrary commands.
